content:
Team
We have a Payer Server from Cambia that is also available for testing. Please let me know if anyone wants to test the server with their client and we will forward the credentials to test.

Hey,
Shouldn't the bulk export only be a GET, not a POST?
https://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/export/index.html
Second question: Is the body in the Oauth2 endpoint a temporary solution for testing this week or expected as part of the implementation?
There's an internal server error being returned when trying to get the ndjson URLs: "getWriter() has already been called for this response"
Yes it should be only a GET. Will check with Cambia
I will check on the other 2 questions also and get back
The Payer is using Apigee appliance for OAuth implementation and the security aspects will remain so, until they implement the Backend Services Authorization in the future.
@Sakshi Mittal I am testing it now and will confirm if it works for you...
I was able to donwload only Coverage.ndjson , the other resources are not working. So the payer is
The payer team is looking into it.
Once the fixes are in place I will notify for further testing
